articles.description: Former Indian cricketer Virender Sehwag has slammed Shubman Gill for his poor shot-selection in T20 cricket. Sehwag was totally unimpressed with Gill after he scored a three-ball duck in Gujarat Titan

articles.title: 'I did decently in World Cup but got dropped': IND star on snub; 'Made no sense' - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Despite scoring over 300 runs in the World Cup, the star India batter reveals he was left 'frustrated' after getting dropped from the squad for the subsequent series. | Cricket
